definitions.definition: if someone is on the gravy train, they have found and easy way to make lots of money.
a sequentially ordered set of things or events or ideas in which each successive member is related to the preceding
a series of consequences wrought by an event
definitions.example: it led to a train of disasters

definitions.definition: piece of cloth forming the long back section of a gown that is drawn along the floor
definitions.example: the bride's train was carried by her two young nephews
